title: API Validation
content: API boundary validation blocks malformed requests early, reduces unsafe states, and improves deterministic behavior in distributed systems.

title: Health Checks
content: Health check endpoints provide fast service status verification for deployments, load balancers, and uptime monitors.

title: Deterministic AI Settings
content: Deterministic AI behavior is improved by fixed prompts and settings such as temperature zero and top_p one, reducing output variance.

title: Authorization
content: Server enforced authorization prevents users from invoking protected actions without a validated session and role checks.

title: Observability
content: Observability combines logs, metrics, and traces so teams can diagnose failures and performance regressions quickly.

title: Secrets Management
content: Secrets must be stored in environment variables or secret managers, never committed to code or logs.

title: Continuous Integration
content: Continuous integration runs lint test and build checks on each change, raising release confidence and preventing regressions.

title: Retrieval and Citations
content: Retrieval augments responses by injecting relevant source context and citations, improving factual grounding and auditability.

title: Vertical Slices
content: Vertical slices deliver small end to end functionality increments quickly, balancing speed and reliability through iterative hardening.
